title: Who managed to get ex couple Malaika and Arbaaz back together again? View pic - Bollywoodlife.com
text:
Who managed to get ex couple… Who managed to get ex couple Malaika and Arbaaz back together again? View pic Malaika Arora and Arbaaz Khan were chilling together this afternoon. Read on to get the full report... By Pooja Nayak | Updated: February 22, 2017 6:42 pm Malaika Arora Khan, Sonam Kapoor, Sonakshi Sinha: Meet super hot water babies of B-town 
So Malaika Arora and Arbaaz Khan were spotted chilling together this afternoon. A picture of Arbaaz with Malaika’s family has been doing the rounds on the internet where the estranged couple is happily seen posing for a family pic. But before you wonder if this again is a sign they are getting back together for real then let’s clarify, the couple is just assuring their divorce doesn’t affect their relationship with each other’s families. I mean, just like how Malaika still joins the Khandaan for family get-togethers. Arbaaz too is keeping up his cordial relations with his in-laws like take for instance even today, Arbaaz made sure he joins the Arora family to celebrate Malaika’s father’s birthday. Also read: Malaika Arora Khan and Arbaaz Khan divorce: 5 SHOCKING conspiracy theories surrounding their split 
All thanks to Amrita Arora who shared this picture, we got this glimpse of the happiness galore at the Arora house. Such a loving selfie, isn’t it? Reminds us how even Arbaaz had clarified in his recent interview on how he’s going to continue maintaining good terms with Malaika’s family, irrespective of what’s their relationship status right now. He said, “Just because we’re separating, doesn’t mean we have to be worried about each other’s equations. I have a child with her, so we have to have a cordial and a great relationship. We’re very amicable with the split we had. I’m close to her side of the family, something that you can all see. My association with her family has been that of over 21 years, which is almost like a lifetime. I have a growing up child, so there’s a lot of parenting responsibilities and duties we have to do and it can only happen if the atmosphere between the two of us is very conducive and normal. We both are extremely mature and can handle this.” A post shared by Amrita Arora (@amuaroraofficial) on Feb 21, 2017 at 7:44pm PST 
Guess that explains it all, isn’t it? Do share your thoughts on this picture in the comments below and keep watching this space for more updates.
